website_summaries.verdict: An affordable and durable rashguard that won't ride up.
pros: Select from a few colors, including lake blue and florescent orange
Boardshort connector loop allows you to tie the tee to your shorts
cons: Sizing is a little on the small side and fits a little too snug
Some buyers say the cut and fit is off, and that it doesn't wear well

customer_reviews.title: At 6 ft and ~200lb I normally fit fine with room to breath in an XL
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is just OK... it will do the job. Sizing is IMO a little on the small side. At 6 ft and ~200lb I normally fit fine with room to breath in an XL... this shirt is a little on the snug side...

customer_reviews.title: like the shirt
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to have a shirt to wear in and around the water that I don't mind getting wet. This fits as I expected. There's a loop on the bottom hem to attach the shirt to your shorts. That feature came in handy on a water slide with a rougher than expected exit. After a summer of (ab)use it has held up well. I'm considering getting a second.
